verbose_text: To obtain a high level expression of MtDEF4.2 in transgenic wheat, a 231 bp full-length MtDef4.2 cDNA sequence was synthesized (GenScript Inc., NJ) using the monocot preferred codons and cloned as a NcoI-XbaI fragment between the Tobacco etch virus (TEV) mRNA leader sequence and Cauliflower mosaic virus (CaMV) 35S polyadenylation signal in the pRTL2 vector.
